description:
Fuyuki accidentally volunteers to be the anchor in the relay race on Sports Day.  He`s terrible at sports, so his future looks bleak.  And then Giroro loses his precious picture of Natsumi, and his cat`s determined to replace it!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki, Do Not Give Up for the Sports Meet / Giroro, I Know what a Cat is
Les rencontres sportives de l`école / Un chat bien attentionné
冬樹 運動会はあきらめない であります / ギロロ 猫は知ってる であります
